SDG_TARGET:
3.1

By 2030, reduce the global maternal mortality ratio to less than 70 per 100,000 live births
SDG_INDICATOR:
3.1.2

Proportion of births attended by skilled health personnel
STAT_CONC_DEF: Is the proportion of total live births in a period that are attended by a skilled birth attendant trained in providing lifesaving obstetric care.
DATA_COMP: Calculated as the number of births attended by skilled health personnel (doctors, nurses or midwives) divided by the total number of births in the same period and multiplied by 100.
COVERAGE:
Earliest available data

1992

Geographical coverage

National

  • Place of Delivery (Health facility, Elsewhere), Wealth quintiles
COMPARABILITY:
Indicator available

Percentage distribution of live birth in the five years preceding the survey by person providing assistance during delivery, according to background characteristics
